# Introduction

This R package is built for analyzing repeated spatially-indexed multivariate functional data using a multi-level multivariate  functional model. A detailed description of the model and related estimation is available in Alam and Staicu (20xx). 

# Installation

To install the package, run the following codes

```{r}
#| eval: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
devtools::install_github("https://github.com/msalam14/rSiMFD")
```
